website_summaries.verdict: A feature-rich spa that's worth the higher price tag for users who like the idea of dual foot- and calf-massaging capabilities.
pros: Large capacity is designed to soak feet and lower legs
Has waterfall and water jet options
Built-in foot rollers provide additional massaging action
cons: Takes a little time to fill the unit and heat the water for use

customer_reviews.title: The Best Foot Spa!
customer_reviews.text: As a letter carrier I walk on average 8 miles a day. As you can imagine my feet are sore after a long day at work. I've used other brands of foot spas and they don't even come close to Carepeutic Foot Spa.
customer_reviews.author: jimmie  yuen jr.

customer_reviews.title: Well this is a real good foot bath
customer_reviews.text: Well this is a real good foot bath. Love that it keeps temperature what you set, can use bath salts and soaps and the massage feels good and is not too noisy. I am giving this 2 stars, however, because I have to return due to 2 units having holes on the bottom of the item that lead to water leaking. If yours leaks, check the bottom and look in the red grooves for cracks or holes. Also the drainage function leaves a lot of water left in the unit that you still have to dump it, could have just used a hose drain like some others. May reorder when more in stock, but hate having to play lottery game.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Shenefelt

customer_reviews.title: USED! WITH HAIR IN IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I received one that was used. It has a disgusting smell when I opened it and even worse it has hair in it! DISGUSTING!! I cannot believe that I spent over $200 for this !!
customer_reviews.author: Shuang Boothe

customer_reviews.title: Great foot spa
customer_reviews.text: Great foot spa..worth the money. Warms the water up very well, rollers are great for the massage and the drainage is awesomejust need a big bucket so there is no splash everywhere..no more pedicites at the salon.
customer_reviews.author: kaykay

customer_reviews.title: Expensive,  but quality throughout.
customer_reviews.text: Very high end product. Everything on this unit was designed with a lot of forethought. A bit on the pricy side, but you get what you pay for. The only reason I didn't give the elusive 5th star, was because the bumpy rollers in the bottom, that rotate, kind of hurt the feet. I found that I wasn't able to keep both feet inside at the same time, because I had to hold one foot slightly up, off the rollers while it was in operation. You're unable to do this when both feet are in the tub. Because you'd be lifting one and applying more downward pressure to the other. All in all, a pretty good item.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell C.

customer_reviews.title: Drain issue will give you more foot pain than you already have.
customer_reviews.text: It constantly has the drain issues. The fact that manufacturer had to make two drain videos show how many people had struggled with drainage issue with this foot bath machine. After using the machine you follow the instructions to drain the water and it doesn’t drain. You play around many ways and still doesn’t drain most of the time. If lucky to get the drain button worked out, it will not drain completely so you have to lift the machine on your own anyway. I get more foot pain by listing this machine after the use.
customer_reviews.author: edamame

customer_reviews.title: Aaah Refreshing!!
customer_reviews.text: Much much better than expected works extremely well at relaxing feet and up to mid calf. Extremely good massage action very good bubble action and the waterfall is awesome. construction seems to be of good material and seems to be very sound.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 12 and have more than enough room. Takes about twenty minutes to heat the water and another ten to get it really hot! Bubble feature could have been stronger. Water fall setting is nice. Massage rollers are too rough in my opinion. They could have used a softer plastic. Takes 3 gallons of water (for water fall feature).
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: size 9 male feet did not fit ??!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to curl my toes upward and or lift my foot up to fit over the massage rollers. who would design this cramped foot design? the only good thing was the handle to carry and the motor to pump the water out. overpriced !!!
customer_reviews.author: BILL NICOLEN

customer_reviews.title: Best feet spa
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a few foot spa's........but this one has everything that I want. I'm 6'5, 300 & my foot size is 15. My feet barely fit, but it's very comfortable. My favorite things about it is that you can change the Heat, the rollers on the bottom move wit 1 touch button, the water doesn't just help out your feet it does your calf's also, it has a timer feature, the ozone bubbles or air bubbles as they call it Blow about a eight out of 10. This foot spa is a bit pricey but it's worth every dollar. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: L. riley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Everything works well except for the motorized function that is supposed to drain out the water when done with massage. I returned the first one I ordered because this drainage function did not work at all. Unfortunately, when I received the replacement foot spa/massage, the motorized drainage function did not work either. The spout would initially shoot out some water, a couple of ounces at most, and then it would stop and I would hear the motor continuing to run but without pumping out the water. I was disappointed because I really like everything else about this model. I will be returning the replacement one because the drainage function does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: On casters for easy moving and has pump for easy emptying.
customer_reviews.text: Have nerve problems and swelling since foot surgery. This has done wonders since the very first time I tried it. Love this spa. Recommended it to my step-mother and podiatrist and physical therapist, who are delighted with the results I’m getting.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Senecal

customer_reviews.title: Leave 4 cups of water after drain feature
customer_reviews.text: Changing my rating. You have to manually drain some water but this product is great. Helps your feet and lower legs. I used this once and it leaves 4 cups of water after drainage. I will probably return it but hoping someone tells me why this occurs. 4 cups is a lot. It will create mold. Actually, no water left would be better.
customer_reviews.author: RTS

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Wow! Wow!  Exceeds my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is worth every cent! I love it! I can soak my feet and a good part of my legs at the same time. I use the water several times before changing it. I love how it heats its own water. I loved this so much that I bought one for my grandfather-in-law and hand carried it to Brasil! He love it too!
customer_reviews.author: WLH B&B

customer_reviews.title: Your feet will love you.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Follow the instructions....not sure why you have to put cold water in it, but that is what is said to do....so, I did. Heats up the water pretty fast and keeps the water at the desired temp. There are a lot of comfort features and your feet will love you. The auto drain feature is nice. Pricey, but worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: B. Buckalew

customer_reviews.title: This is a horrible product. I would like to send it back
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible product. I would like to send it back. It was an open box and it doesn't work correctly. At one point the waterfall just stopped working the temp said it was 54 C...It doesn't go up that high. It was filthy when I got it and it smell to high heaven. It was used by someone and the company didn't have the common sense to clean it up before it was mailed out. This is trash really. Now to find out how to get my money back. Don't buy this product if you think you can call them up. There is no phone number of them...there is no working website. What a horrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: Researcher and Writer

customer_reviews.title: Best Foot Spa Hands Down
customer_reviews.text: Heats up fast, easy to drain, easy to clean, just all around easy to use. I LOVE how this spa makes my aching feet feel :-)
customer_reviews.author: Ted H.

customer_reviews.title: Everyones tastes are different
customer_reviews.text: The water did not bubble as I expected from the description where it said "Strong air bubble massage" and the other reviews. Could be I expected too much, but I returned it because I didn't like it enough to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Ann

customer_reviews.title: Carepeutic is worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.text: After sending the non-performing Natsukage All in One back, I decided to give it another shot. The Carepeutic outperforms the Natsukage by alot. I didn't like the drain on the Natsukage and the jets, waterfall and bubbles were weak. All these features are much better in the Carepeutic for the little extra cost. The Carepeutic drain pumps right into a container instead of trying to lift the Natsukage to drain it or dump it. I had to scoop the water out with a pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: William Hunn

customer_reviews.title: First time of use it was great!!
customer_reviews.text: First time of use it was great!!! the rest of the times it didn't roll, dind't keep water hot, only warm. too expensive to keep if at the third use stop rolling and keeping water warm.
customer_reviews.author: Graciela

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - it does a great job
customer_reviews.text: Works quietly, easy to maintain temp for longer soaking, nice massaging effect, too. I've thrown out lesser units for being noisy or too quick to cool, so Ihope this one works for many more years.
customer_reviews.author: Pomaikai

customer_reviews.title: I found if you pull out the cover and basket ...
customer_reviews.text: I found if you pull out the cover and basket you can place your hand over the Jet hole to get the drainage to work.
customer_reviews.author: PixieBandit

customer_reviews.title: Best Foot Spa I Have Found
customer_reviews.text: Most amazing foot spa ever!! So relaxing to feet and ankles! The different functions are great. Water heats up very fast and the massage function feels wonderful! While pricey it worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: JANE RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome results (so far).
customer_reviews.text: This is a great foot spa, but have only used it once so far. Just hope it lasts. Unfortunately, the company's website is nowhere to be found. And not so sure what the ozone feature does, if anything, but it doesn't really matter.
customer_reviews.author: W.B.E.

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: So this was a Christmas gift for my 12 yr old daughter who plays volleyball . Once the package was opened we could not wait to use it. Just as the reviews stated easy instructions and a comfortable relaxing treat for actually the entire family . Money well spent .My daughter stated that she will use it daily and was Thankful for her present.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara  Denham

customer_reviews.title: It is nice unit, if worked right
customer_reviews.text: It is nice unit, if worked right, power drain didn't work and waterfall feature stopped working. nice room for feet, not crowded at legs and foot massage felt nice. had 2 units, 2nd unit did same as 1st one and ended up sending both back.
customer_reviews.author: Freeman Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Technology that needs work
customer_reviews.text: The drainage featured malfunctioned TWICE (original and replacement) we sent both back. No contact info provided by Carepeutic; for trouble shooting; warranty info not on website. Rest of features work fine especially foot massage. Can you believe that some customers keep this product even though the drainage does not work; rolling it into a shower or out the door? And they pay $193 (including tax) for the privilege of using this lame machine?
customer_reviews.author: Rudolph Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, she was coming home from work all sore. This thing is so awesome even I use it from time to time. The deepness makes relaxing to easy.
customer_reviews.author: chad walker

customer_reviews.title: 2 bad pumps
customer_reviews.text: Nice features on the product but the 1st one I ordered the pump did not work. Sent it back and asked for a replacement -- pump did not work on the 2nd one either. Sent it back and asked for a refund. If it had fully worked it would have been a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: sunyvail

customer_reviews.title: spendy but better than sending a cheap one back
customer_reviews.text: well made. lots of power, heats quickly. spendy but better than sending a cheap one back. if the cost is not prohibitive to you then this is the one to buy. it is expensive for a reason. it is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: cx

customer_reviews.title: Was nice while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: Has already stopped working. Can hear water sloshing around in the very bottom after dumping the water and letting it sit for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: way to expensive but it worked wonders on my diabetic feet
customer_reviews.author: JERRY KRAMER

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Draining the water part is not working but it’s ok
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big, but good
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Ease of use. only wish it had a handle. the rollers are invaluable. i pull it by the cord once its full.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It works best ever
customer_reviews.text: Love it would be nice if it had a handle and a remote
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. It actually keeps the water warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Luck! appearances are deceiving
customer_reviews.text: worked well until the draining part never worked ....come on for the price I would expect something much better will return
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Silva

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but nothing that exceptionally better than what ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, but nothing that exceptionally better than what I got from a $40 footbath I purchased in Europe about ten years ago.
customer_reviews.author: I.Lobben

customer_reviews.title: ... tried a couple at Amazon and finally this works great. can soak leg
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a couple at Amazon and finally this works great. can soak leg, can use herbal, heat up fast and maintains heat, have water fall,wave, and gentle massage. That's all I need.
customer_reviews.author: Ye Wang

customer_reviews.title: Rollers feel great. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Water heats up fast and stays hot. Rollers feel great. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: This machine is great and really helps my feet
customer_reviews.text: This machine is great and really helps my feet! I am pregnant and don't have a bath so this is the next best thing for my swollen feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband is very satisfied with the quality of this product
customer_reviews.text: Husband is very satisfied with the quality of this product! Even my 7 year old uses it after ballet class!
customer_reviews.author: Yony A.

customer_reviews.title: Not much bang for your buck here. For 220$ ...
customer_reviews.text: Not much bang for your buck here. For 220$ i thought you would get some bubbles, and be able to feel the jets. If i wouldnt have destroyed the box , i would have sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use and drain
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised... used 17 times so far no problems... very easy to use and drain.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works great Heater is very responsive Too notch all the way around
customer_reviews.author: Eric I.

customer_reviews.title: Great foot bath
customer_reviews.text: This foot bath is the perfect depth and truly heats up and massages very well. I love it very much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriends loves it. His size 11. 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriends loves it. His size 11.5 foot fits with no problem. Soothing his diabetic feet that he also stands on all day at work.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Rice

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: I Love it, it's a great buy, if you're on your feet all day and everyday, this is what you need...
customer_reviews.author: YOLANDA TRAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Great Footspa!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!! It takes a bit of time to warm up to where you want it but everything else is superb
customer_reviews.author: Davin

customer_reviews.title: Top quality foot spa and massager
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, high quality, large foot spa. Heats up water quickly, has great jets and waterfall options, and rolling massagers on bottom to relax feet. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Erickson

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, the Carepeutic Ozone Waterfall foot and leg spa is everything I wanted and more. I use it with bath salts, and it makes a very refreshing and relaxing experience. It is easy to empty, and it keeps the water a very nice temperature. I like the waterfall feature.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Bender

customer_reviews.title: Excellent at home therapy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband tore his Achilles tendon and a part of his at home PT was the use of this product. His Doc was amazed at his recovery with the help of it. I love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I researched the foot baths and found ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I researched the foot baths and found this the best rated. I use it daily and add sea salt to the small container for a soak. GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Don't weast the money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my husband in February, 2017. Guess what? The pump stopped working!!! $200+ down the drain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Hate Relationship
customer_reviews.text: I have returned this item twice - both times because the motorized drain WOULD NOT WORK properly. This is crucial as this spa holds a large amount of water. The 2nd replacement item I received DID NOT WORK AT ALL. I opted to keep 1st replacement because the motorized drain did allow water to escape if I tipped the unit on its side. It is able to maintain water temperature beautifully. The massage and different spa modes work as well. But I hate to use it because I know that I'll have an issue draining it. Since the third unit did not work at all my confidence has been shaken about this maker of this product.
customer_reviews.author: FOUWAT

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Water drain pump stopped working after a week. I've tried everything.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Great spa!
customer_reviews.text: This spa was worth the price! My 93 year old Father likes it. Make his feet feel good!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Burkhalter

customer_reviews.title: Pump issues
customer_reviews.text: Water pump quit and would not restart. No way to trouble shoot. No way to contact company. No web site. I returned it immediately. I thought I was buying the top of the line.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my purchase. Thank you for the fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn T.

customer_reviews.title: Very good machine, really relax
customer_reviews.text: Very good machine, really relax, everything works gret, not too big or too small! I can highly recomment this to anybody!
customer_reviews.author: Helena Lahtinen

customer_reviews.title: Every bad review on this item is true don’t waist your time or money
customer_reviews.text: This is the lowest quality in the market stoped working the second day. Low quality and not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this foot spa yo anyone
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this foot spa yo anyone.. I have had it now for 4 weeks! I use it everyday. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eloise  Webb

customer_reviews.title: Love all the the changes you can make
customer_reviews.text: Love all the the changes you can make...water stays good and warm...get warm quickly...couple of minutes. Little hard to roll around though
customer_reviews.author: Cinde May

customer_reviews.title: Did not work - returned
customer_reviews.text: I unpacked the unit, and became suspicious when reading the instructions, which were in broken English. Plugged it in and it started to heat up. At about 34C, the temp started dropping, never to return. Then the massage function stopped working. I unplugged it and started over, only to find the unit would not power on. Of course with no power the drainage motor was inoperable, so I had to hoist it up and dump it. I will not buy from this manufacturer again, and would caution anyone planning on purchasing this unit. I will seek other options.
customer_reviews.author: BB from Maine

customer_reviews.title: Drain Pump Didn't Work!!
customer_reviews.text: Heated up nicely and the massage rollers where also good. The bubbles were just so-so. It seemed like such a great purchase until I tried to use the drain feature. One spurt of water came out and then nothing. This thing is awfully big and heavy to have to drag it to the tub to drain. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Slyce

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Just received a couple days ago, used it last nite & works very well.. Heat & massage function really well. Am quite happy with my purchase & after comparing comparable units ,this one has the best features . My only hesitation - there is not much of a warranty. Amazon refers you to manufacturer should any issues arise & enclosed manual states that you should contact the retailer ?? Hopefully will not need help with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Zap

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend to my friends
customer_reviews.text: This foot spa gets the water very hot, very fast and that's what I was looking for. The construction is solid and it's multiple functions work well. I would definitely recommend to my friends. On a side note, the issue with some water left in the bottom after draining can be little annoying, especially considering the price you pay. That's the only reason why I took off 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: SHAWN BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: I really like the temperature control feature. (this part is true). And then there are those two adorable infrared lights illuminatiing my heels throughout the entire 50 minute therapy. And the little (plastic?) balls in the "mineral container" that jiggle around with the flow of the water. And to top it off, those hard plastic knobs on the rollers that beat your feet to death and test your capability for overcoming masochistic pain. Can't wait to put myself through this therapy tomorrow. I believe it will make me a better man.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pflueger

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite ways to relax! There is absolutely nothing to dislike about this product. I have used it several times, and it greatly helps to ease my foot pain caused by arthritis. The heater keeps the water at an even temperature, and the massager and waterfall leaves my feet and lower legs feeling very relaxed and pain-free. The drain is electric powered and very easy to manage. Wheels make it easy to move this machine to the storage closet when I am finished using it. This really is a win/win product.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept, potentially dangerous design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this foot bath 4 years ago and loved it, then it went into storage (closet) for a couple of years, and when I dug it out and used it, discovered a massive leak that got into my carpet. When I took it apart to fix it, I discovered a potentially dangerous design. See the video for more detail.
customer_reviews.author: Richie C.

customer_reviews.title: Weak jets/bubbles!
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to have this but it wasn't long into the first use you could see it lacked good power. A previous cheaper model was way stinger with jets and bubbles. Heat is an easy thing, the jets and bubbles is what makes these a good product and this model was lacking for it's pricetag. Thanks to Amazon for accepting the quick return.
customer_reviews.author: Impulser

customer_reviews.title: Brand new machine, but drain won't work
customer_reviews.text: The machine does a good job, it feels great after being on my feet for 13hrs a day as a nurse. I have used it once and the drain will not function. It shoots a spurt of water out and then does not continue to drain, only makes a whining sound. The product is defective I believe. Company sent replacement item. Worked great for a month, display won't work, buttons won't work. Can't adjust temp, mode, or anything. Can't even turn the machine off...profuct is useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: It's big. Nothing to rush out to order. Not much bubble action to write home to mom about either. Would I purchase again ... probably not. Should you purchase if (like me) you're on the fence...no. I am sure there are far better units at a fraction of the cost. Does heat nicely though.
customer_reviews.author: S Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Easy to fill
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to fill. Heats quickly. I actually want to use this with ICE COLD water and it works well too. Just turn off the heat mode and fill it with cold water. Add a handful of ice cubes and it circulates the cold water with ozone air bubble and massage if you want. Heat feels great too. I have a size 13 foot and my feet fit in nicely. The massage rollers work nicer for smaller feet, but still feel good. This is the best foot spa on the marked. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk820

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This foot spa is excellent. The foot massage rollers are powerful enough to give a descent foot reflexology, however, you have to move your feet to the pressure points needed. The unit is a great quality, unlike the previous one purchased which I had to return due to water leak. It keeps the heat of the water well however you have to pour in warm water as it will take a long time to heat up cold tap water. This is probably the same for all other foot spa units. My wife uses this a lot more than I do, she is very happy with this foot spa and that is all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, one that works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: It's everything expected. If you really want the BEST, this one is IT. I would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Goss

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Foot Therapy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and efficient. Dispenses dirty water well. Challenging to clean out the inside with soap and water. However, I would buy again❗️
customer_reviews.author: Good Friends TG

customer_reviews.title: Drain problems
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled at how well this worked. The problem was that the drain would not function so I sent it back for refund. I re ordered it again because I really did a nice massage on my feet. I am now returning the second one for the same reason. The drain worked for 2 min then quit and I couldn't get it to work again. I am sad. I want to buy another but will have to be a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: BSTJ

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a runner and loved this to relax her feet and legs after a workout. The jets are a bit weak but overall a great product and very relaxing. I like you can add bath salts and the easy drainage. Not all the water comes out but you can just dump the rest easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would like to give it a 5 star
customer_reviews.text: I would like to give it a 5 star! The product is with high quality and the experience is great. The only deficiency is the drainage system which require the machine to be turned on... Otherwise I can easily empty it in the shower room.
customer_reviews.author: Kan T.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best. Very strong rotating massage
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. Very strong rotating massage. Easy to use with the drain in the back to empty dirty water without having to lift. I use salts in my mine and it runs for a nice 45 minute session which is perfect for achy feet! This is one of the best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Worked once, and never again
customer_reviews.text: Unit worked out of the box. Next day tried to use it and it would never start up. Gave up and returned the unit for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product works nicely ~ I am a female with size 11 and ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works nicely ~ I am a female with size 11 and so I wish it were longer because the rollers are too far forward for large feet - it works amazing on tired feet but I don't recommend it if your feet are larger than a 9 or 10 ~ I will continue to squeeze my feet in and enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Using it for the first time out of the box, it would not drain at all. I tried several times and all it would do is just squirt a short burst of water out of the spout and no more. This unit is much too heavy to empty without a working drain system. It had some good features such as a good water depth, really hot water, and massaging rollers but it must have a working drain to be worth it - it was expensive. Thank you Amazon for you easy return system.
customer_reviews.author: Discover

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, the most advanced 'Foot Spa' on the market. If you're looking for something serious and effective--Look no further. This is it.
customer_reviews.author: Etty M.

customer_reviews.title: Lukewarm review and wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised by power is weak. The drain function is good, but the basket for salts or herbals is not essential. If I had to do over again, I would not spend the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gary T

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Wife's Christmas present; it seems like a quality unit and it does a good job on tired, sore feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jimsiggy

customer_reviews.title: ... is I thought it would move the water around better, more like a hot tub jet
customer_reviews.text: Only thing about it that I am not thrilled with is I thought it would move the water around better, more like a hot tub jet.
customer_reviews.author: retired

customer_reviews.title: I looked for the best foot spa I could find and came across this ...
customer_reviews.text: I had an orthotripsy surgery and they told me to soak my feet after the procedure. I looked for the best foot spa I could find and came across this one. I am in love with this bad boy! Very easy to use, the water dump made it easier so I didn't have to lift it, very easy to clean. Water stays warm and the waterfall, sprayers , and rollers are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It was pricey but very much worth it. My feet have never felt so good (even after pedicures and foot massages).
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: so many great
customer_reviews.text: drain only worked the first few times of use. I returned it but was charged a restocking fee for a defective appliance. I really wanted this to work...so many great features
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Toma

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful feet!!
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a foot soaker this is the one you want!!!! Great machine!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Slickzak

customer_reviews.title: yes.
customer_reviews.text: Everything I thought it would be. The next step up from this is a hottub
customer_reviews.author: Zach Ohlman

customer_reviews.title: Drain feature failed after one use
customer_reviews.text: Nice features if they all work and continue to work. On second fill and use, power drain feature would no longer work. For $229 this should work flawlessly for many years and come with a warranty for at least two or three years. It is as heavy as the other reviews stated, so difficult to carry and drain by hand. Returning it for a replacement, but if it fails again, will return for refund.
customer_reviews.author: keoki

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very bulky but was willing to wrangle it if it provided the functions. Pump to empty the H2O didn't work. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Rarely Rate

customer_reviews.title: A different drain problem
customer_reviews.text: Instead of failing to drain as many have complained, the one I received can only drain. When I set it up and turned it on the display immediately indicated that the drain valve was open even though it was closed. I opened and closed it several times hoping there was a stuck switch. But no luck. It drained fine when I hit the drain button, but it refused to operate as a foot bath. I was hoping I had done something stupid, but I can't see what it could be. So back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Davis

customer_reviews.title: Do like this. And feet feel great after if
customer_reviews.text: Do like this. And feet feel great after if. It's not a WOW. But does a nice job. It is quiet and stays warm. easy to move around. I wish bubbles were stronger, and it is way overpriced for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: V. Miedema

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The family loves it. I had pain around the bottom of my heel and this baby cured it. No more pain and you feel like you are in heaven. Worth every penny. The massage is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: I loved the foot spa
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this product but returned it for an exchange due to the drain component didn't work properly. Ended up returning the foot spa for drainage issues too. Other than the drainage issues, I loved the foot spa.
customer_reviews.author: VNP

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if it worked as well as it claims.
customer_reviews.text: Pump didn't work! Massage is minimal, as is the air bubble/ozone. Way too expensive!
customer_reviews.author: FrEd1956

product_meta.title: Carepeutic Ozone Waterfall Foot and Leg Spa Bath Massager, 20 Pound
product_meta.description: Treat your feet with the undeniable luxury comfort! Integrating ozone benefits into hyperthermia healing therapy, this Carepeutic Ozone Waterfall Foot and Leg Spa Bath Massager makes hot-tub spa a natural and effective way to relieve your painful, sore, tired feet and refresh meridians of body through its heated, ozonated water. Featuring four different automatic massage programs with selection of rolling massage, ozone therapy, air bubble massage, and heated water surfing therapy, it boosts circulation to bring oxygen to the tissues to soothe sore muscles on legs and feet. With the four built-in motorized massage rollers located inside the calf-deep water container, when the waterfall or water jet surfing system is activated, it gives you hot-steam rolling massage on sole and effectively melt away your calf and foot stress while you are enjoying the hot-tub spa. Equipped with advanced water temperature automatic balancing system, its thermal control device will be activated automatically to turn on or off the heating function when its current water temperature is lower or higher than your selected temperature, you can simply sit back and relax. The strong waterfall and two powerful water jets circulate water with moist hot air bubbles, which helps stimulate foot reflex zones and relieve your foot tension with motorized, heated water rolling massage. In addition to its double insulation design and overheat protection, it has built in hidden and yet motorized smart water drainage system that can automatically lock or unlock the spa system when draining out water, simply press one button to open the hidden drainage valve to remove water without lifting up the container or taking it to bathroom, safety is completely attested. You can choose to add herbal bag or bath oil into its detachable herbal bag container or use its extra mineral stone container come with the package. Its built in hidden compartment for power cord storage and built in mobile casters make convenience for storage or transport. Its extra large water container fits foot with any size.
feature_bullets: Integrating ozone benefits into hyperthermia healing therapy to relieve painful, sore feet and refresh meridians of body through its heated water in the calf-deep water container.
Combined action of ozone therapy and heated water surfing and rolling massage to boost and increase uptake of oxygen and improve body circulation.

Strong air bubble massage with waterfall or water jet surfing system, waterfall and water jet can work alone or simultaneously. Equipped with detachable herbal bag container, one extra mineral stone container included.
Strong waterfall and two powerful water jets circulate water with infrared heat and moist hot air bubbles to help stimulate foot reflex zones.
With smart thermal control water temperature automatic balancing system. Hidden and motorized smart water drainage system with double insulation for safety protection.Default massage time: 50 minutes
